body_html:
@gaussic , for example
new_http_archive(
name = "dagre",
build_file = "bower.BUILD",
url = "https://github.com/cpettitt/dagre/archive/v0.7.4.tar.gz",
strip_prefix = "dagre-0.7.4",
)
you can download dagre from the link directly and store in a local path like /home/argman/dagre, then change the http archive to
new_local_repository(
name = "dagre",
build_file = "bower.BUILD",
path = " /home/argman/dagre"
)

new_http_archive(
name = "dagre",

strip_prefix = "dagre-0.7.4",

you can download dagre from the link directly and store in a local path like /home/argman/dagre, then change the http archive to
new_local_repository(
name = "dagre",
build_file = "bower.BUILD",
path = " /home/argman/dagre"
)
body:
@gaussic , for example
new_http_archive(
  name = "dagre",
  build_file = "bower.BUILD",
  url = "https://github.com/cpettitt/dagre/archive/v0.7.4.tar.gz",
  strip_prefix = "dagre-0.7.4",
)
you can download dagre from the link directly and store in a local path like /home/argman/dagre, then change the http archive to
new_local_repository(
  name = "dagre",
  build_file = "bower.BUILD",
  path = " /home/argman/dagre"
)
